data.title: The McAuley Catholic High School
data.meta_description: School Ratings for The McAuley Catholic High School, Cantley Lane, Cantley, Doncaster, South Yorkshire, DN3 3QF. This school was rated Good by Ofsted in February 2024. For it's latest set of GCSE results it scored an 44.8 attainment 8 score. 40 percent of students got a grade 5 or above in Maths and English and 61 percent of students got 5 or more GCSEs at grade 9-4 (A-C).

Description

beta

The McAuley Catholic High School is an educational institution located at DN3 3QF Doncaster, South Yorkshire, England. Established in 1981, it is coeducational, with a Catholic religious affiliation. The school's academic population consists of students aged 11 to 18. McAuley High is a Specialist School for the Performing Arts, providing a well-rounded curriculum with focus areas including art, business, journalism, language arts, mathematics, physical education, psychology, religion, science, social studies, and theater. McAuley Catholic High School's color is purple.
